title: When people start to realize that Ekko and Zilean are OP.
body:
They start to show up every game.
http://i.makeagif.com/media/6-11-2015/Gm7E6j.gif

replies.body: https://i.makeagif.com/media/10-18-2015/P-ztOm.gif
I still say we should petition to have the Chronoshift dance appear in game for Zilean.
When they finally update his appearance it BETTER be his new dance.
https://youtu.be/7eL5kj5FE4E AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!! I LOVE THIS

Ekko is just OP. Able to go from AD to AP very easily.

Zilean just is popular because Overwatch's Mercy can resurrect and see how useful it is. Also, his small kit touch ups are very nice. His buffed E is better when used on an enemy than ally, but using it on an ally is fine (though its duration on allies could be buffed a little). His W allows for him to spam his abilities. His buffed Q also stuns enemies which is extremely useful and easier to do than with some other supports. Yet, Zilean is far from easy to use, especially when trying to use as a support. Trying to not KS and also not die in the meantime.

> [{quoted}](name=Rew711,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=yR9qFMP1,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-08-29T21:02:21.621+0000)

> Ekko is just OP. Able to go from AD to AP very easily.
> 
> Zilean just is popular because Overwatch's Mercy can resurrect and see how useful it is. Also, his small kit touch ups are very nice. His buffed E is better when used on an enemy than ally, but using it on an ally is fine (though its duration on allies could be buffed a little). His W allows for him to spam his abilities. His buffed Q also stuns enemies which is extremely useful and easier to do than with some other supports. Yet, Zilean is far from easy to use, especially when trying to use as a support. Trying to not KS and also not die in the meantime.

And I will say the same with Karma and those who main her.
srsly stop picking/banning her - even if she's strong, there's far worse out there that is worth a pick/ban lmao

damage ekko doesn't function when not overpowered. This much should've been clear before they released him.
